trans-unit.source: true if sz1 and sz2 have equal width and height; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx $xx$xx0$$xx$ xxx $xx$xx0$$xx$ xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if sz1 and sz2 differ either in width or height; false if sz1 and sz2 are equal.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx $xx$xx0$$xx$ xxx $xx$xx0$$xx$ xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx $xx$xx0$$xx$ xxx $xx$xx0$$xx$ xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
